{{doomwiki|Nordhell (GZDoom)|Nordhell}}[[Image:Nordhell.png|thumb|An icy cold night, with a bright moon.]] {{Wad| name = NORDHELL | author = Alexander "Eternal" S. (aka Deadall) | port = GZDoom | iwad = Doom2 | type = s | status = Released | link = {{idgames|id=15167}}
{{idgames|id=15175||Non-ZDoom version}} }} == Description == Eternal is mostly known for his "limit removing" port requiring maps, which vary from slaughter style gameplay to limit based maps. However, he does rarely make a GZDoom project. This one makes use of Dynamic Lighting, full 3D architecture, DECORATE and many other features to bring a dark wintery map to the table. Featuring black imps, white demons, "Beholders" and Revenants in Santa hats in combination with snowy trees and a vast winter wonderland, the environment presented is both odd and unique. Mixed in with a fairly brooding start to the music, the player may at first feel that he's in for a horror WAD, but as the pace picks up and the Beholders come into play, he quickly realises that this is much more. The non-ZDoom version, without ZDoom and GZDoom features, is very different in style and atmosphere.
